name: MMM-PublicTransportHafas
text: This module displays real-time departure times for public transportation.
description: Stay informed about the upcoming departures from your local public transit stations.

name: MMM-2Day-NOAA-Forecast
description: Show 4 consecutive 12-hr forecast, provided by NOAA National Weather Service API. No user registration nor API-key required.

name: MMM-NewsFeedTicker
text: Stay informed about the latest news with this dynamic news ticker module.
description: Mod of the default newsfeed module - shows the logo and scrolls the headlines and brief description across the screen like those seen on the news channels.

name: MMM-Autobahn
description: Traffic warnings for the german Autobahn.

name: MMM-GoogleCalendar
description: Get your Google Calendars in the shape of MagicMirror's default calendar.

name: MMM-SingleStock
description: Displays the stock price of a single company without any fancy animation.

name: MMM-Instagram
description: Stay connected with your social media accounts using this dynamic social media feed module.

name: Health and Fitness Tracker
description: Display google fit daily step count and weights.
